name: Elemental Forest
description:
You find yourself in a Forest and a large Orb that follows you everywhere.

Explore the space and you might find items to engage with. 

Created for the Seattle Indies Game Jam.

Theme: Unexpected Results.

Team created an experience for Oculus Go using Unity 2018.2.14

Sounds from BBC Sound Effects and Audio Sound Effect Adobe Audition

Assets Used

VR Arc Teleporter for Locomotion

LowPoly Environment Pack
Fountain Prop
Magic Particle Systems Lite
